no.headline: Hei!
no.content:
Jeg er Christian – entusiast når det gjelder innovasjon, entrepenørskap og data.

Dette er en nettside som jeg har laget for å leke med nye teknologier og vise frem ting jeg har gjort.

Jeg digger å mekke med data og finne ut hvordan ting virker. Når jeg ikke sitter foran PC-en finner du meg på joggetur, i utlandet et eller annet sted, eller i ferd med å lære meg nye språk.

Nedenfor kan du

en.headline: Hi!
en.content:
Christian here. This is my personal website. I made it with the purpose of playing with new technologies and to be able to show thing that I've done.

I'm at the end of my 20s, and I have lived abroad the last years. Lately in Germany, but earlier also in France, where I have both taken degrees and worked. I love to travel, to learn languages and explore the world. At the same time, I also find it rewarding to sit inside and fiddle with stuff to figure out how they work.

On this website you'll find my work portfolio, my resumé and a bit and pieces related interests I have.
